# Raw

**Enumeration Case**

An algorithm that uses timestamp values as-is.

## Declaration

```swift
Raw
```

## Discussion

Under this algorithm, the Host doesn’t apply any filtering to the time stamps returned from [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioClockDevice/GetCurrentZeroTimestamp].

## Clock-Smoothing Algorithms

- **SimpleIIR**: The simple IIR filter algorithm.
- **TwelvePtMovingWindowAverage**: The 12-point moving window average filter algorithm.

items.description: The 12-point moving window average filter algorithm.
items.name: TwelvePtMovingWindowAverage
